headline: LyondellBasell: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: HOUSTON (AP) — LyondellBasell Industries (LYB) on Friday reported a loss of $892 million in its third quarter. On a per-share basis, the Houston-based company said it had a loss of $2.77. Earnings, adjusted for asset impairment costs and to account for discontinued operations, were $1.01 per share.
